text: Sered nykh ye tsey khto krutyat聞 yikhni yazyky imituvaty svyate pysannya, shcho vy mozhete podumaty tse ye z svyatoho pysannya, koly yomu ye ne z svyatoho pysannya, ta vony zayavlyayut聞 shcho tse ye z BOHA, koly yomu ye ne z BOHA. Otzhe, vony vymovlyayut聞 brekhnyu ta prypysuyut聞 yim do BOHA, znayucho
